com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap

Class BitmapFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap.BitmapFilters

  • public class BitmapFilters
extends Object
    Commonly used bitmap filters

    Author:
    elton.stephen.kent

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CLAMP_EDGES
      Clamp pixels off the edge to the nearest edge.
      static int WRAP_EDGES
      Wrap pixels off the edge to the opposite edge.
      static int ZERO_EDGES
      Treat pixels off the edge as zero.

      static Bitmap deBlurHorizontalHalftone(Bitmap bitmap, int n0, int n1, int n2, int n3, int n4, Bitmap.Config outputConfig)
      The weights specified are scaled so that the image average brightness should not change after the halftoning.

      • deBlurHorizontalHalftone

        public static final Bitmap deBlurHorizontalHalftone(Bitmap bitmap,
                              int n0,
                              int n1,
                              int n2,
                              int n3,
                              int n4,
                              Bitmap.Config outputConfig)
        The weights specified are scaled so that the image average brightness should not change after the halftoning.
        Parameters:
        n0 - the weight for pixel (r,c+1)
        n1 - the weight for pixel (r,c+2)
        n2 - the weight for pixel (r,c+3)
        n3 - the weight for pixel (r,c+4)
        n4 - the weight for pixel (r,c+5)
